launcher.startScript: (cd ~/jenkins-utils && git pull git@github.com:sifive/jenkins-utils.git) && \ AGENT_NAME=SLURM.TINY.006 \ JNLP_SECRET=501fd7062836d3aebd3aa15f8edc67f3d474bafb647487d92dd12f39fe5a6106 \ JENKINS_AGENT_SLURM_PARTITION=redhat \ JENKINS_AGENT_CPUS_PER_TASK=8 \ JENKINS_URL=https://jenkins.internal.sifive.com/ \ ~/jenkins-utils/tools/jenkins-agent-salloc-tiny.sh
